select c.id, c.name, c.room, c.begin_date, c.end_date, c.master_id, c.create_time, c.update_time, e.name masterName, case when now() > c.end_date then '已结课' when now() < c.begin_date then '未开班' else '在读中' end status from clazz c left join emp e on e.id = c.master_id
and c.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and c.end_date between #{begin} and #{end}
order by id desc
